name: Angel Killer
storyline:
62 clues, 22 endings, 6 suspects, 1 day to find the truth.

It has been three months since the untimely death of Suzuki Tohru. Since then, the police opened and closed their investigation, the courts conducted and concluded their trial. Everyone, whether by incompetence or by darker reasonings, is content in believing her death was an accident, that she was taken from this world by mere chance.

But I know it was not what her fate was meant to be. Her death was not random chance nor divine act. It was murder. It was through the festering of cruelty and evny within the darkness of humankind that her death was allowed to take place.

Someone is at fault for this and I will find out who. I will find the one responsible and realise vengeance upon them. Justice will be had and justice shall be mine.
summary: A non-linear murder mystery set in early 2000's with 22 different endings
